author: mount2010
comment: In the weekly slides section of politemall, go to the latest section, there is a part called nect quiz. This shows the tested items. Then use Cisco Netacad to watch videos and revise on the topics listed. Also review the slides from week 1 onwards.

author: IndependentNo6105
comment: Network Components, Types and Connections (W1) Network Media (W2) Internet Protocol (W2) IPv4 Addressing (W3) Network Testing Utilities (W3) Wireless and Mobile Network (W5) Cloud Concepts Overview (W6) AWS Global Infrastructure Overview (W7) Types of Cloud Services (W7) Sustainability in Network and Cloud Computing Environment (W8) these are the topics tested as listed in the announcements

comment: Should be in the slides, near the beginning Its where you download packet tracer, the "Networking Basics" course Reason why I don't link directly is that the slides also have instructions on how to login
